description:
Legendary Codebreaker Feat 15
GeneralSkill
Source Core Rulebook pg. 262
Prerequisites legendary in Society
Your skill with languages and codes is so great that you can decipher information with little more than a quick read through a text. You can Decipher Writing using Society while reading at normal speed. If you slow down and spend the full amount of time thatâ€™s ordinarily required and roll a success, you get a critical success; if you critically succeed while spending the normal amount of time, you gain a nearly word-for-word understanding of the document.
